results.description: Booking.com is the world’s 1 accommodation site and the 3rd largest global e-commerce player. We are truly global with over 135 offices worldwide.The Interface and Connectivity team (part of the hotel support team) is looking for a Connectivity Account Manager to support and extend our impact in the DACH region.
